title: "TV Clip Study Suggest That People Prefer Voice-Only AI Companions Over Human-Like Robots"
excerpt: "In a recent study, using clips from Black Mirror, volunteers thought a voice-only AI would make a better companion than a perfect human replica. Is it the uncanny valley or just reflecting the AI companions we already know?"
